attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy Clarkson has been forced to apologise because of a statement he made while promoting "Top Gear Live" in Australia. The statement was "In England we have this one eyed Scottish idiot"

These are all facts. He has one eye, he is scottish and a good proportion of the UK think he is an Idiot.

Since when has freedom of speech demanded "apologies" ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
